verizon_gis.name: Verizon Enterprise GIS
verizon_gis.description: Internal Verizon pole inventory with inspection metadata, ownership, attachments.
verizon_gis.loader_hint: Create secure connector in src/ingestion/verizon_loader.py to pull nightly dumps.
verizon_gis.documentation: Coordinate with Verizon GIS ops for SFTP/API credentials; avoid storing secrets in repo.
verizon_gis.notes: Once available, merge with OSM feed inside run_pilot._load_historical_poles().

state_permitting.name: State & County Utility Permits
state_permitting.description: PennDOT/municipal permit exports covering pole installs, relocations, and retirements.
state_permitting.loader_hint: Add parsers under src/ingestion/state_permits.py to normalise schemas.
state_permitting.documentation: Check PennDOT OpenData, city data portals; prioritise CSV/GeoJSON dumps.

commercial_aerial.name: Commercial Aerial Imagery
commercial_aerial.description: Leaf-on/off 30 cm imagery tiles (Maxar, Planet, or state orthos) covering Harrisburg AOI.
commercial_aerial.loader_hint: Extend src/detection/tile_catalog.py to index new raster directories before YOLO runs.
commercial_aerial.documentation: Capture acquisition metadata (timestamp, sun angle) in tileset_manifest.json.

street_level.name: Street-Level Imagery
street_level.description: Mapillary / Kinetik panoramas for corridor QA and hard-negative mining.
street_level.loader_hint: Use src/utils/harvest_mapillary.py then extend ingestion/street_level.py for labeling queue.
street_level.documentation: Requires MAPILLARY_TOKEN or similar API keys set via environment variables.

pamap_orthophotos.name: PAMAP Leaf-Off Orthophotos
pamap_orthophotos.description: Pennsylvania leaf-off aerial imagery (6–12 inch) for high-resolution detection reruns.
pamap_orthophotos.loader_hint: Use state download scripts under src/ingestion/pamap_downloader.py to sync GeoTIFFs.
pamap_orthophotos.documentation: Available via PA Spatial Data Access (PASDA); ensure CRS metadata stored alongside tiles.

naip_historical.name: NAIP Historical Imagery
naip_historical.description: Prior-year NAIP tiles for multi-season training and change detection.
naip_historical.loader_hint: Organise per-year subfolders; extend detection tile catalog to use seasonal variants.
naip_historical.documentation: Download from USDA NRCS Geospatial Data Gateway (public domain).

usgs_3dep_extended.name: USGS 3DEP Point Clouds
usgs_3dep_extended.description: Expanded Harrisburg 3DEP LAS/LAZ tiles for pole height derivation.
usgs_3dep_extended.loader_hint: Run src/ingestion/lidar_pipeline.py to convert point clouds to DSM/DTM rasters.

nlcd_landcover.name: National Land Cover Dataset
nlcd_landcover.description: Land-cover raster to identify forest, wetlands, and built-up areas for contextual scoring.
nlcd_landcover.loader_hint: Download via USGS MRLC; store reprojected raster matching AOI.
nlcd_landcover.documentation: Public domain; metadata required for provenance.

nhd_hydrography.name: National Hydrography Dataset
nhd_hydrography.description: High-resolution hydro polygons/lines to mask rivers and lakes.
nhd_hydrography.loader_hint: Use src/ingestion/nhd_ingest.py to subset Harrisburg HUCs and simplify geometries.
nhd_hydrography.documentation: Freely available via USGS NHD download services.

tiger_roads.name: TIGER + PennDOT Roads
tiger_roads.description: Merged TIGER/PennDOT road centerlines for ROW proximity checks.
tiger_roads.loader_hint: Combine Census TIGER shapefiles with PennDOT centerlines under src/ingestion/road_loader.py.
tiger_roads.documentation: Census TIGER (public domain) plus PennDOT open data license.

fcc_asr.name: FCC Antenna Structure Registration
fcc_asr.description: Registered towers to help distinguish poles from tall structures.
fcc_asr.loader_hint: Download weekly ASR CSV and parse via src/ingestion/fcc_asr_loader.py.

hifld_energy.name: HIFLD Energy Infrastructure
hifld_energy.description: Highway Infrastructure Foundation Level Data – energy asset points/lines.
hifld_energy.loader_hint: Use DHS/HIFLD open datasets to capture substations, transmission lines, etc.
hifld_energy.documentation: HIFLD open data license; review usage terms.

municipal_open_data.name: Municipal Harrisburg Assets
municipal_open_data.description: City/County asset registries or permit logs to corroborate OSM poles.
municipal_open_data.loader_hint: Scrape CS/Harrisburg open data portal via src/ingestion/municipal_loader.py.
municipal_open_data.documentation: Check municipality-specific licensing terms before redistribution.

mapillary_refresh.name: Mapillary Metadata Refresh
mapillary_refresh.description: Quarterly dumps of Mapillary metadata for corridors, enabling labeling campaigns.
mapillary_refresh.loader_hint: Schedule harvest_mapillary.py with date filters; store incremental snapshots.

lidar_pointcloud.name: USGS / Enterprise LiDAR
lidar_pointcloud.description: Classified point clouds or DSM rasters for pole height estimation and vegetation clearance.
lidar_pointcloud.loader_hint: Add processing routines to src/ingestion/lidar_pipeline.py to derive pole height rasters.
lidar_pointcloud.documentation: USGS 3DEP available via AWS Open Data; enterprise mobile LiDAR via secure share.

vegetation_row.name: ROW & Vegetation Layers
vegetation_row.description: Utility easements, land-cover, weather/outage overlays to refine contextual scores.
vegetation_row.loader_hint: Augment src/fusion/context_filters.py to consume new rasters/vectors.

compliance_filings.name: FCC Compliance Filings
compliance_filings.description: Pole attachment reports, outage logs, or third-party audit results.
compliance_filings.loader_hint: Parse filings under src/ingestion/compliance_loader.py and merge recency metrics.
